mapper.insert: insert into SKYPG.TBLHOST_INFO (SITE_HOSTING_ID, HOST_NM, TYPE_GUBN, HOST_CORP_ID, APPLY_CONTACT_YN, DEV_CONTACT_YN, CHG_NM, CHG_TEL, CHG_EMAIL1, CHG_EMAIL2, JOIN_MONY, YEAR_MONY, FEE_MONY, HOST_FEE, JOIN_MONY_DIST, GUARANTEE, PKG_MONTH, INSURE_MONY, USE_YN, ETCS, REG_ID, REG_IP, REG_DT, TERM_GUBN, MOD_DT, SALE_DT, ECOMMERCE_NO, FIX_RATE_FEE, FIX_AMOUNT_FEE, CARD_FEE_TYPE, HOST_SALE_TYPE) values (#{siteHostingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeGubn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostCorpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyContactYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{devContactYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgEmail1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgEmail2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinMony,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{yearMony,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{feeMony,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{hostFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{joinMonyDist,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{guarantee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pkgMonth,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{insureMony,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{termGubn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{saleDt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ecommerceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixRateFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fixAmountFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cardFeeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostSaleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select SITE_HOSTING_ID, HOST_NM, TYPE_GUBN, HOST_CORP_ID, APPLY_CONTACT_YN, DEV_CONTACT_YN, CHG_NM, CHG_TEL, CHG_EMAIL1, CHG_EMAIL2, JOIN_MONY, YEAR_MONY, FEE_MONY, HOST_FEE, JOIN_MONY_DIST, GUARANTEE, PKG_MONTH, INSURE_MONY, USE_YN, ETCS, REG_ID, REG_IP, REG_DT, TERM_GUBN, MOD_DT, SALE_DT, ECOMMERCE_NO, FIX_RATE_FEE, FIX_AMOUNT_FEE, CARD_FEE_TYPE, HOST_SALE_TYPE from SKYPG.TBLHOST_INFO

select SITE_HOSTING_ID, HOST_NM, TYPE_GUBN, HOST_CORP_ID, APPLY_CONTACT_YN, DEV_CONTACT_YN, CHG_NM, CHG_TEL, CHG_EMAIL1, CHG_EMAIL2, JOIN_MONY, YEAR_MONY, FEE_MONY, HOST_FEE, JOIN_MONY_DIST, GUARANTEE, PKG_MONTH, INSURE_MONY, USE_YN, ETCS, REG_ID, REG_IP, REG_DT, TERM_GUBN, MOD_DT, SALE_DT, ECOMMERCE_NO, FIX_RATE_FEE, FIX_AMOUNT_FEE, CARD_FEE_TYPE, HOST_SALE_TYPE from SKYPG.TBLHOST_INFO where HOST_NM LIKE '%' || #{word,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
